A lightweight modular JavaScript framework.

Main features:

  • Minified and GZipped only ~2 kb
  • CSS Selectors
  • CSS Manipulation
  • DOM Manipulation
  • Traversing
  • AJAX-Requests
  • Events
  • Data
  • Chaining

Optional features:

  • Animations
  • Bindings
  • Template-Engine
